name: Galen Corey
bio: Galen is a full stack developer from New York City. She made a career change from teaching math to writing code in 2016, and loves finding ways to use her teaching skills and passion in the tech world. When she isnâ€™t teaching or coding, you can usually find Galen reading on the subway, or writing poetry about how disgusting the subway is.

talks.title: 4 Mistakes from my First Open Source Contribution
talks.desc: We all know we should be contributing to open source. But if you are like me, actually doing it for the first time can be daunting. I made my first contribution to an open source project this year, and there were a lot of hurdles that tripped me up. In this talk, I will share the mistakes I made in that first PR, as well as the things that I did well that helped me (eventually) get that PR merged.
